QueryViewSpec.Author: UM Dev
QueryViewSpec.Description: Provides the ability to query all versions of patient names for populating the USR_UMHS_SEARCHPATIENT table.
QueryViewSpec.Name: Search Patient All Names

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: SELECT D.ID UMHSID, CONSTITUENT.ID CONSTITUENTID, UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(D.FIRSTNAME, '.', '')))) FIRSTNAME, UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(D.KEYNAME, '.', ''), '''', '')))) KEYNAME, UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(D.NICKNAME, '.', ''), '''', '')))) NICKNAME, ISORGANIZATION, ISGROUP, UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(D.MIDDLENAME, '.', '')))) MIDDLENAME, D.TITLECODEID, D.SUFFIXCODEID FROM DBO.CONSTITUENT JOIN USR_UMHS_DATA D ON D.CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENT.ID
